HOME.TITLE: TellMyScore
HOME.INTRO: Many board and card games require someone to keep the score. But that someone can be your phone!
HOME.FEATURE1_DESC: Just enter your players' names and start tracking!
HOME.FEATURE2_DESC: You can always go back and edit scores entered. TellMyScore is not here to interfere with your game.
HOME.FEATURE3_DESC: No input is ever transmitted to a server, everything in stays your browser
HOME.FEATURE4_DESC: Works on smartphones and tablets as well as it does on desktop browsers.
HOME.FEATURE5_DESC: Can be added to your home screen and will from then on work even when you have no connection
HOME.FEATURE6_DESC: Free of ads, free of charge. And the code is available on Github, too
